file_content.text: A powerful and dangerous Sith named Lord Sundar has gone mad and now roams the tomb of Tulak Hord. If you can eliminate him, you have been promised a great reward.

A researcher named Ephran Zell located an ancient Sith device known as "The Red Engine," which is said to contain Tulak Hord's greatest secrets. Ephran Zell wants you to brave the tomb, activate the Red Engine and then kill creatures in its presence to fuel the device.
